attributes.additional_details: Id like for the government to consider our childrens mental week being and allow them to have this escape for a few hours a day
attributes.background: Children's health and mental well being is so important especially in these times. It's hard for children to remain lockdown and they need to be active and some children are at risk being at home all the time and boxing gyms are sometimes a safe sanctuary for these children.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553694
